summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation by offering AI-powered features like automatic summary generation and intelligent reading statistics. It supports multiple AI services, multi-language summaries, content cleaning, and efficient caching. Additionally, it provides accurate character counting, code detection, reading time estimation, and smart language recognition. The project ensures performance optimization, error handling, and easy installation via direct download or Git clone methods. Users can configure AI summaries for specific folders and choose AI services like OpenAI or DeepSeek.
